AdditionalCaps.desc: Template for additional caps structure

IePossibleAdditionalCaps.desc: Below are additional caps for IE-11 also known as options InternetExplorerOptions
IePossibleAdditionalCaps.desc1: The values for each option are set to there default
IePossibleAdditionalCaps.desc2: IE 11 does not have Extension or Preferences classes
IePossibleAdditionalCaps.desc3: These can be added to Fixture who's BrowerType is InternetExplorer

AdditionalCaps.desc: IE-11 set in class InternetExplorerOptions
AdditionalCaps.desc1: Note use acceptSslCerts for IE and not acceptInsecureCertificates like in other borwsers
